server_description: Where different minds thrive and create amazing things together 💜

WELCOME & RULES.📋-rules: Safe space rules (be kind, be authentic, be you)

SAFE SPACES.🌊-overwhelm-support: When everything feels like too much

BUSINESS BUILDERS.💡-idea-bounce: Bounce wild ideas off each other

community_guidelines: 🛡️ No masking required - be authentically you
⏰ Respect different energy levels & time zones
🔄 It's okay to disappear and come back
✨ Celebrate small wins as much as big ones

onboarding_sequence.day_1: Welcome DM with community intro video
onboarding_sequence.day_3: Check-in: How are you settling in?
onboarding_sequence.day_7: Invite to share your first project/idea
onboarding_sequence.day_30: Feedback: How can we support you better?

content_themes.Monday: 💭 Mind Dump Monday - Share your scattered thoughts
content_themes.Tuesday: 🔧 Tool Tuesday - What's helping your brain today?
content_themes.Wednesday: 🎯 Win Wednesday - Celebrate any size victory
content_themes.Friday: 🎉 Feature Friday - Show off your creations
content_themes.Sunday: 🌱 Sunday Reset - Prep for the week ahead
